column1: Connected and Autonomous Vehicle Engineering (Automotive) MSc
column5: The automotive sector is changing rapidly. Car manufacturers and technology companies are developing new autonomous technologies that will redefine the future of transport. With the rapid adoption of smart vehicle functions, industry requires a unique set of skills from its engineers and programmers. The MSc in Connected and Autonomous Vehicle Engineering (Automotive) will develop your technical and transferable skills in advanced computing, robotics and network-enabled technologies to prepare you for a career within the automotive sector.Who is it for?This course is suitable for engineering, science, mathematics and computing graduates alongside experienced engineers who are interested in a career in the automotive or intelligent mobility sectors.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
